metadata.Title: CVE-2023-33460 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.Description: There's a memory leak in yajl 2.1.0 with use of yajl_tree_parse function.which will cause out-of-memory in server and cause crash.

criterions.comment: argyll: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
r-cran-jsonlite: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
yajl: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
